languages.text: {n}Идира делает шаг назад, словно ее ударили.{/n} "Но почему?!" {n}Она вглядывается вам в лицо и, словно отыскав в нем ответ, судорожно вздыхает и кивает.{/n} "Т-так точно, Лорд-капитан. Я... приступлю к выполнению. Прощайте".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира делает шаг назад, словно ее ударили.{/n} "Но почему?!" {n}Она вглядывается вам в лицо и, словно отыскав в нем ответ, судорожно вздыхает и кивает.{/n} "Т-так точно, Лорд-капитан. Я... приступлю к выполнению. Прощайте".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira steps back like she's been struck.{/n} "But why?" {n}She stares at your face and seems to find an answer there, because she lets out a trembling sigh and nods.{/n} "Y-yes, Lord Captain. I'll... start making arrangements. Farewell."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉退了一步，仿佛被猛地击中了。{/n}“可这是为什么？”{n}她盯着你的脸，似乎在你的表情中找到了答案。随后，她发出一声颤抖的叹息，点了点头。{/n}“遵、遵命，舰长大人。我会……开始收拾东西的，永别了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira steps back like she's been struck.{/n} "But why?" {n}She stares at your face and seems to find an answer there, because she lets out a trembling sigh and nods.{/n} "Y-yes, Lord Captain. I'll... start making arrangements. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉退了一步，仿佛被猛地击中了。{/n}“可这是为什么？”{n}她盯着你的脸，似乎在你的表情中找到了答案。随后，她发出一声颤抖的叹息，点了点头。{/n}“遵、遵命，舰长大人。我会……开始收拾东西的，永别了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira steps back like she's been struck.{/n} "But why?" {n}She stares at your face and seems to find an answer there, because she lets out a trembling sigh and nods.{/n} "Y-Yes, Lord Captain. I'll... start making arrangements. Farewell."

languages.text: {n}Idira da un paso atrás, como si la hubieras golpeado.{/n} «Pero ¿por qué?». {n}Te mira a los ojos y parece encontrar una respuesta en ellos, porque deja escapar un suspiro trémulo y asiento.{/n} «E-entendido, Lord Capitán. Empezaré a... prepararlo todo. Adiós».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira steps back like she's been struck.{/n} "But why?" {n}She stares at your face and seems to find an answer there, because she lets out a trembling sigh and nods.{/n} "Y-yes, Lord Captain. I'll... start making arrangements. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira da un paso atrás, como si la hubieras golpeado.{/n} «Pero ¿por qué?». {n}Te mira a los ojos y parece encontrar una respuesta en ellos, porque deja escapar un suspiro trémulo y asiento.{/n} «E-entendido, Lord Capitán. Empezaré a... prepararlo todo. Adiós».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは何かに打たれたかのように後退りする。{/n}「でも、どうして？」{n}彼女はあなたの顔を見つめ、そこに答えを見つけたようだ。彼女はため息をついて頷いた。{/n}「わかったわ、ロード・キャプテン…手配を始めるわね。さようなら」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira steps back like she's been struck.{/n} "But why?" {n}She stares at your face and seems to find an answer there, because she lets out a trembling sigh and nods.{/n} "Y-yes, Lord Captain. I'll... start making arrangements. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは何かに打たれたかのように後退りする。{/n}「でも、どうして？」{n}彼女はあなたの顔を見つめ、そこに答えを見つけたようだ。彼女はため息をついて頷いた。{/n}「わかったわ、ロード・キャプテン…手配を始めるわね。さようなら」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira tritt einen Schritt zurück, als sei sie geschlagen worden.{/n} "Aber warum?" {n}Sie starrt in dich Gesicht und scheint dort eine Antwort zu finden, denn sie stoßt ein zitterndes Seufzen aus und nickt.{/n} "J-Ja, Lord Captain. Ich ... treffe die Vorkehrungen. Lebt wohl."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira steps back like she's been struck.{/n} "But why?" {n}She stares at your face and seems to find an answer there, because she lets out a trembling sigh and nods.{/n} "Y-yes, Lord Captain. I'll... start making arrangements. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira tritt einen Schritt zurück, als sei sie geschlagen worden.{/n} "Aber warum?" {n}Sie starrt in dich Gesicht und scheint dort eine Antwort zu finden, denn sie stoßt ein zitterndes Seufzen aus und nickt.{/n} "J-Ja, Lord Captain. Ich ... treffe die Vorkehrungen. Lebt wohl."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira fait un pas en arrière, comme si vous l'aviez frappée.{/n} « Mais pourquoi ? » {n}Elle semble trouver une réponse dans votre regard, car elle pousse un soupir résigné et tremblant en hochant la tête.{/n} « Ou-Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je... vais me préparer. Adieu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira steps back like she's been struck.{/n} "But why?" {n}She stares at your face and seems to find an answer there, because she lets out a trembling sigh and nods.{/n} "Y-yes, Lord Captain. I'll... start making arrangements. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira fait un pas en arrière, comme si vous l'aviez frappée.{/n} « Mais pourquoi ? » {n}Elle semble trouver une réponse dans votre regard, car elle pousse un soupir résigné et tremblant en hochant la tête.{/n} « Ou-Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je... vais me préparer. Adieu. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, ağır bir darbe almışçasına geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Neden ki?" {n}Bakışlarını diktiği yüzünde âdeta bir cevap arıyor. Ardından titreyen sesiyle iç çekerek başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "B... Başüstüne Lord Kaptan. Ben... Gerekli hazırlıklara başlayayım. Elveda."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira steps back like she's been struck.{/n} "But why?" {n}She stares at your face and seems to find an answer there, because she lets out a trembling sigh and nods.{/n} "Y-yes, Lord Captain. I'll... start making arrangements. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, ağır bir darbe almışçasına geri çekiliyor.{/n} "İyi de neden?" {n}Bakışlarını diktiği yüzünde âdeta bir cevap arıyor. Ardından titreyen sesiyle iç çekerek başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "T... Tabii ki Lord Kaptan. Ben... Hazırlıklara başlayacağım. Elveda."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
